title: Drawing, "Large Decorative Oval with WPAT in Center with Musicians in Corners", 1963
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite and collaged paper
description: Original artwork for radio station WPAT Carcard project. On a black ground, colorful musicians in each corner surround a collaged medalion with the letters WPAT in elaborate lettering.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Large Decorative Oval with WPAT in Center with Musicians in Corners", 1963.
1963. Brush and gouache, graphite and collaged paper. Gift of John Rombola. 2004-14-6.
